title: I just realized we could make a comment chain rainbow
body:
If done in this order -

Rioter (red)
Regular poster (orange, looks close enough right?) / or NA Player Support apparently, wat?
Archivist (yellow)
Moderator (green)
Advisor (blue)
Dunno where we'd get an indigo, but bonus points here if we did
Warden (purple/violet)

Do with this information what you wish

---

edit - 

https://image.prntscr.com/image/iSPFs_pPQBqzMq6jK2rCaw.png

_Rainbow achieved_ 

######Ty Cry4 Azykan for the screenshot
